name: 2024 4th International Conference on Accounting, Auditing and Finance
content: Publication: Submissions will be peer-reviewed by conference committees, and accepted papers will be published in the International Journal of Trade, Economics and Finance(IJTEF). International Journal of Trade, Economics and Finance(IJTEF) ISSN: 2010-023X (Print) Frequency: Bimonthly DOI: 10.18178/IJTEF Abstracting/ Indexing: ProQuest, Crossref, Electronic Journals Library , EBSCO, and Ulrich's Periodicals Directory
